quotes: First be kind to yourself! Before You can be kind to others!
It`s a good Day to have a good Day!
Be so completely yourself that everyone else feels safe to be themselves too.
I am surrounded by People who Believe in me.

projects.title: Instagram Downloader
projects.description: This is an NodeJs Application wich can download Storys or Videos or IGTv's from particular Users

projects.title: Hoster-List
projects.description: This is an NodeJs and JavaScript Application! In Which i store all the servers i've bought to keep track of the uptime or Performance and the Price

projects.title: MySQLApi
projects.description: An Extreme Useful MySqLWrapper in NodeJs build on the basic mysql package with Object Relational Wrappers a Table Creation feature also timestamp features eg.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: The Website were you currently watching Written in Html, JavaScript and CSS To Display something about me!

projects.title: Netty-Backend
projects.description: A Whole NettyBackend written in Java! Similar to Express with configurable middlewares and routes!

projects.title: Ez-Uploader
projects.description: An Image and Text Uploader written in NodeJs with the abillity to sort them in nested folders or also share

projects.title: Auto-Deployer
projects.description: An in NodeJs written Continous Integration system with the abillity to link with github and perform actions and send discord webhooks!

projects.title: Github-Information
projects.description: An Github Information API written in NodeJs JS and CSS to display stats about a github user! But see for yourself!

projects.title: Hosting System
projects.description: An in NodeJs and Vue written fully configurable Hosting System which can manage vServers and Minecraft-Servers with a integrated ProxmoxAPI a Minecraft Relay and an only for this system written mcmanager api!

projects.title: Amazon-Price-Tracker
projects.description: An in NodeJs written Amazon Tracker which not only tracks the price it also tracks the delivery and description! And if somehting changes the user gets mailed!

projects.title: Ez-Monitoring
projects.description: This is a Monitoring application which is written in NodeJs and JavaScript and it displays the uptime, cpu, ram e.g. of each server! Actually is an bundle of 3 Projects Firstyl the Core which runs once on a server and is obviously the backend! Secondly the Client which is obviously the frontend and runs the Website and Lastly the Slave which runs on all Servers you want to have Monitor Informations from!

projects.title: JWork
projects.description: An web Framework written in JavaScript for general Testing purposes and to learn how big Frameworks like React or Vue nearly handle those things!

projects.title: Server WebStats-Plugin
projects.description: This is an Minecraft Web Stats Plugin written in JavaScript for the Frontend and in Java for the Backend and made to fast and simple view stats from the minecraft server!
